refnamediv.refpurpose: Auto generate function classes related code

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: oil-regclasses is a utility to generate class registering and attaching code

listitem.para: <class_definition_file>.h -- Public header for users of your module to include, you may modify it
<class_definition_file>_register_classes.c -- Contains a function named "<class_definition_file>_register_classes ()", which will register all classes listed in the class definition file

<class_definition_file>_attach_classes.c -- Contains a function named "<class_definition_file>_attach_classes ()", which will attach all classes listed in the class definition file with testing information
